Translations.Text: Vos keep tuus utterances secret declare them He est fully aware de innermost thoughts
He non know quod He Should created He est Sublime Cognizant
He est Unus put Terra tuus service Roam its corners eat His provisions To Eum est ultimus summoning
Vos guaranteed ut Unus caelum non strike terra causa it perfecit tumble
Vos guaranteed Unus caelum non send vos violent storm Vos tunc appreciate value My warning
Others them disbelieved quam terrible est My requital
they non vide birds habuit them lined columns spreading their wings The Multus Gracious est Unus habuit them in the air He est Seer totus things
ubi those militis est help vos contra the Multus Gracious? Indeed disbelievers deceived
Qui est ibi to provisus pro vos He withholds His provisions Indeed they plunged deep into transgression aversion
Unus walks dum est slumped his face bene guided 1 qui walks straight rectus path
dictus He est 1 initiated vos granted vos hearing eyes brains. Rarely est vos appreciative
dictus He est Unus locus vos terra ac Eum vos summoned
They challenge When ut prophecy advenit pass vos est truthful
Dictus Such knowledge est DEUS; ego est non multus than manifest warner
